Chatbot.description: A Chatbot uses Google Gemini via LangGraph to conduct natural language conversations. It maintains session state (message history), supports both single-turn and multi-turn chats, allows interactive CLI sessions, and lets users adjust response "temperature" (creativity/randomness).
workflow: Initialize: Configure model, provider, temperature, and API key
Chat: Send and receive messages maintaining history

chat.description: Send a single user message; return response.

interactive_chat.description: Start an interactive CLI chat session.

WebScrapingAgent.description: Dynamically scrapes web content based on user prompts, extracting structured information. Generates queries, searches URLs, scrapes content, and extracts according to schemas. Supports streaming intermediate results for observability.

run.description: Execute full scraping and extraction given a prompt.

prompt.description: User prompt describing what information to scrape

run_and_stream_watch.description: Stream scraping and extraction process stepwise.

prompt.description: User prompt describing what information to scrape

DatabaseDiscoveryAgent.description: Finds the most relevant database (SQL or flat file) agent for a query by scanning directories. Analyzes schema, relevance, and recommends the best database and querying agent type. It can also query these databases and find out the output in case the user wants something from local database. It is highly recommended to select this agent for local database querying
use_cases: controlling other database agents and coordinatoing between them in case of requirement of local database access
workflow: call relevant agent that will answer the query

select_best_database.description: Select best-matching database and agent for user query.

query.description: User query to find relevant database for

_get_all_databases.description: List all available databases and flat files.

SQLQueryAgent.description: Executes SQL queries on SQLite databases. Analyzes schema, generates SQL from user prompts, executes queries, and formats results.

query_database.description: Run SQL query on specified database with user prompt.

db_path.description: Path to the SQLite database file

FlatFileQueryAgent.description: Queries structured flat files (CSV, TSV, Excel, JSON). Analyzes schema, generates queries, executes data transformations, and returns results.

query_files.description: Run queries on flat files with user prompt.

directory_path.description: Path to directory containing flat files

UnifiedMemoryAgent.description: A next-generation multimodal vector knowledge agent using Faiss and MongoDB. It supports semantic and hybrid search across text, images, PDFs, audio, and dense metadata, integrates ratings/feedback, tags, user personalization, and stores reasoning chains for robust, context-aware RAG pipelines.
capabilities: Ingest and index multimodal documents (text, images, PDFs, audio, transcripts)
Store and retrieve entries with MongoDB (supporting tags, categories, rich metadata, user IDs)
Perform semantic vector similarity search with hybrid tag/category/keyword/user/time filters
Filter by metadata: category, tags, recency (year), user, or keyword
Track feedback: upvote/downvote solutions/workflows to improve future retrieval order
Store and utilize reasoning chains and decision trees for complex answers
Provide hybrid retrieval: combine semantic (vector) and traditional (keyword/tag) search
Enable user-specific and personalized retrieval based on user profile or history
Persist/load Faiss index and MongoDB state for fast, reliable access
Return statistics about index size, category/tag breakdown, recency, and feedback
use_cases: Multimodal semantic search (across text, image, PDF, and audio knowledge)
Enterprise or team knowledge bases with workflow/history and RAG augmentation
Personalized helpdesk, FAQ or code assistant with instant recall and learning
Legal, medical, or research case retrieval by type, tag, user, or recency
Project documentation, decision-flow, and reasoning-chain archiving
RAG for chatbots and LLM-driven apps with filtered, personalized context
workflow: Initialize embedding model, Faiss index, MongoDB, and Pydantic schemas
Ingest and index multimodal documents with accompanying tags/categories, reasoning chains, and user/profile metadata
Encode embeddings and update the hybrid Faiss/MongoDB index
Query using semantic similarity, filtered by tags, keyword, user, rating, or recency
Merge, rank, and return context (with feedback and rating awareness)
Support user upvotes/downvotes; update rating fields to bias future results
Return statistics: entry counts, category/tag breakdown, rating histograms, recent activity

save_knowledge.description: Add a new knowledge entry, with support for multimodal content, tags, category, metadata, user, rating, and reasoning.

entry.description: Knowledge object including text, image/audio/pdf paths, tags, ratings, user, reasoning chain, and metadata

save_workflow.description: Add a workflow/decision chain with all structured and contextual fields.

workflow.description: Workflow object including task, plan, user/tags/metadata, rating and reasoning

retrieve_similar.description: Hybrid retrieval of similar context by vector similarity, with optional filters for tags, category, user, keyword, recency, or rating.

solve_with_memory.description: Semantic + metadata retrieval; returns best solution/workflow ranked by feedback and context with hybrid filtering support.

update_rating.description: Upvote (delta=1) or downvote (delta=-1) a result by entry ID to affect future answer recommendations.

get_stats.description: Return knowledge base statistics and diagnostics (categories, size, recency, rating feedback, etc.).

DatabaseQueryOrchestrator.description: Orchestrates queries by routing them to discovery, SQL, or flat file agents based on query type and data source. Aggregates and streams results to users.
workflow: Delegate queries to SQL or flat file agents

run_and_stream_watch.description: Execute query with streaming output for user prompt.
